description: Try our easy to follow Creamy Tuna & Dill Dip recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Seafood dip,Pescatarian,Fish,Soy free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Creamy Tuna & Dill Dip Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Process 250g light cream cheese, 185g can tuna in springwater, drained, 1/2 cup Greek-style yoghurt, 2 tbs chopped dill, 1/4 cup capers and 1 tbs lemon juice in a food processor until smooth. Transfer to a serving bowl.
